alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 7:32PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Vernon and southeastern Monroe Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 731 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cashton, or 12 miles northeast of Viroqua, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Vernon and southeastern Monroe Counties, including the following locations... Rockton, Oil City, Wildcat Mountain State Park, Jersey Valley County Park, St Marys, Wilton, Clifton, Glendale and Trippville. This includes Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 50 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
